title: Step 7

challengeFiles.name: main
challengeFiles.contents:
def merge_sort(array):
    
    middle_point = len(array) // 2
    left_part = array[:middle_point]
    right_part = array[middle_point:]
    
    merge_sort()
challengeFiles.seed:
def merge_sort(array):
    
    middle_point = len(array) // 2
    left_part = array[:middle_point]
    right_part = array[middle_point:]
    
    merge_sort()

tests.text: You should pass left_part as the argument to your merge_sort() call.

description: Pass left_part as the argument to the merge_sort() call you added in the last step.
